name: Angry Bulls
summary: Angry Bulls is a racing & action game that it is easy to control has thrill sense and has been getting hi-ranking and craze in players all over the world.The fun and anger effects added in the game play where Bull is Angry and out of control with having full of anger, avoid the obstacles such as horrible small fence and hell rings and to get gold and item by controlling rapidly the hi-speedy running was crazy to low down his anger by hitting animals come in his way, makes users have a good fun.
